column1: Baby Barnaby's////I nabbed me a "green eggs" - two egg whites with cheese
column5: and sausage- they let me substitute the vegan sausage
column6: which made my day. The coffee there is organic and perfectly delectable as well
column7: and sitting outside means you're allowed to bring your dog AND that you may have to shoo aside a few flies. It's nicely shaded with ceiling fans galore though
column8: and easier to hear yourself talk than inside.
